author: amyroh
msg: More logging changes - let me know if you see any problems with'em.

author: billbarker
msg: Require that use of AJP/1.3 shutdown is explictly enabled to function.
No Adapter in any version of Tomcat currently supports a clean shutdown from AJP/1.3, so it is better to turn it off (by default) for now.

author: billbarker
msg: Not all exceptions have a message

author: funkman
msg: Allow for customized server header at config time.
So now one can do this:
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag 'TOMCAT_5_5_2'.
